analyzed: tathāgata balam sāvaka bala sāvaka balam

original: Taññeva tathāgatabalaṁ taṁ sāvakabalaṁ, taññeva sāvakabalaṁ taṁ tathāgatabalanti?
analyzed: tat na eva tathāgata balam tam sāvaka bala tam na eva sāvaka balam tam tathāgata balanti

original: Yādisaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ tādisaṁ sāvakabalaṁ, yādisaṁ sāvakabalaṁ tādisaṁ tathāgatabalanti?
analyzed: yādisam tathāgata balam tādisam sāvaka bala yādisam sāvaka balam tādisam tathāgata balanti

original: Yādiso tathāgatassa pubbayogo pubbacariyā dhammakkhānaṁ dhammadesanā tādiso sāvakassa pubbayogo pubbacariyā dhammakkhānaṁ dhammadesanāti?
analyzed: yādisaḥ tathāgatassa pubba yogaḥ pubba cariyā dhammakkhānam dhamma desanā tādisaḥ sāvakassa pubba yogaḥ pubba cariyā dhammakkhānam dhamma desanā ati

original: Tathāgato jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
analyzed: tathāgataḥ jinaḥ satthā sammāsambuddhaḥ sabbaññū sabba dassāvī dhamma ssāmī dhamma ppaṭisaraṇaḥ ti

original: Sāvako jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
analyzed: sāvakaḥ jinaḥ satthā sammāsambuddhaḥ sabbaññū sabba dassāvī dhamma ssāmī dhamma ppaṭisaraṇaḥ ti

original: Tathāgato anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū maggavidū maggakovidoti?
analyzed: tathāgataḥ anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā a sañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā an akkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū magga vidū magga kovidaḥ ti

original: Sāvako anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū maggavidū maggakovidoti?
analyzed: sāvakaḥ anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā a sañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā an akkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū magga vidū magga kovidaḥ ti
indriya para upari yattam yathābhūtam ñāṇam tathāgata balam sāvaka sādhāraṇa nti

original: Hañci sāvako ṭhānāṭhānaṁ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sāvakaḥ ṭhāna aṭhānam jānāti tena vata re vattabbe
ṭhāna aṭhānam yathābhūtam ñāṇam tathāgata balam sāvaka sādhāraṇa nti

original: Sāvako atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ jānātīti?
analyzed: sāvakaḥ atīta anāgata paccuppannānam kamma samādānānam ṭhānasaḥ hetusaḥ vipākam jānāti iti

original: Hañci sāvako atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sāvakaḥ atīta anāgata paccuppannānam kamma samādānānam ṭhānasaḥ hetusaḥ vipākam jānāti tena vata re vattabbe

original: “atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ sāvakasādhāraṇan”ti.
analyzed: atīta anāgata paccuppannānam kamma samādānānam ṭhānasaḥ hetusaḥ vipākam yathābhūtam ñāṇam tathāgata balam sāvaka sādhāraṇam ti
sāvako sabbattha gāminim paṭipadam jānāti iti

original: Hañci sāvako sabbatthagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sāvakaḥ sabbattha gāminim paṭipadam jānāti tena vata re vattabbe
sabbattha gāminim paṭipadam yathābhūtam ñāṇam tathāgata balam sāvaka sādhāraṇam ti
sāvakaḥ aneka dhātum nānā dhātum lokam jānāti iti

original: Hañci sāvako anekadhātuṁ nānādhātuṁ lokaṁ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sāvakaḥ aneka dhātum nānā dhātum lokam jānāti tena vata re vattabbe

original: “anekadhātuṁ nānādhātuṁ lokaṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ sāvakasādhāraṇan”ti.
analyzed: aneka dhātum nānā dhātum lokam yathābhūtam ñāṇam tathāgata balam sāvaka sādhāraṇa nti
sāvakaḥ sattānam nānā adhimuttikatam jānāti iti

original: Hañci sāvako sattānaṁ nānādhimuttikataṁ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sāvakaḥ sattānam nānā adhimuttika tam jānāti tena vata re vattabbe
sattānam nānā adhimutti katam yathābhūtam ñāṇam tathāgata balam sāvaka sādhāraṇam ti

original: Sāvako jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ saṅkilesaṁ vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ jānātīti?
analyzed: sāvakaḥ jhāna vimokkha samādhi samāpattīnam saṅkilesam vodānam vuṭṭhānam jānāti iti

original: Hañci sāvako jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ saṅkilesaṁ vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sāvakaḥ jhāna vimokkha samādhi samāpattīnam saṅkilesam vodānam vuṭṭhānam jānāti tena vata re vattabbe

original: “jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ saṅkilesaṁ vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ sāvakasādhāraṇan”ti.
analyzed: jhāna vimokkha samādhi samāpattīnam saṅkilesam vodānam vuṭṭhānam yathābhūtam ñāṇam tathāgata balam sāvaka sādhāraṇanti

original: Hañci sāvako pubbenivāsānussatiṁ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sāvakaḥ pubbenivāsa anussatim jānāti tena vata re vattabbe
pubbenivāsa anussati yathābhūtam ñāṇam tathāgata balam sāvaka sādhāraṇanti

original: Hañci sāvako sattānaṁ cutūpapātaṁ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sāvakaḥ sattānam cutūpapātam jānāti tena vata re vattabbe
sattānam cutūpapātam yathābhūtam ñāṇam tathāgata balam sāvaka sādhāraṇa nti

original: Nanu tathāgatassāpi āsavā khīṇā sāvakassāpi āsavā khīṇāti?
analyzed: nanu tathāgatassa api āsavā khīṇā sāvakassa api āsavā khīṇā ati

original: Atthi kiñci nānākaraṇaṁ tathāgatassa vā sāvakassa vā āsavakkhayena vā āsavakkhayaṁ vimuttiyā vā vimuttīti?
analyzed: atthi kiñci nānākaraṇam tathāgatassa vā sāvakassa vā āsava khayena vā āsava kkhayam vimuttiyā vā vimutti iti

original: Hañci natthi kiñci nānākaraṇaṁ tathāgatassa vā sāvakassa vā āsavakkhayena vā āsavakkhayaṁ vimuttiyā vā vimutti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci natthi kiñci nānākaraṇam tathāgatassa vā sāvakassa vā āsava khayena vā āsava kkhayam vimuttiyā vā vimutti tena vata re vattabbe
āsavānam khaye yathābhūtam ñāṇam tathāgata balam sāvaka sādhāraṇa nti
